text:
Broadway, north from West 242nd Street. On the left is the stairway of the I.R.T. subway station.

About 1917.

Van Cortlandt Park (Bronx): Viewing west across the lower end of Van Cortland Lake as it is being filled. On the left is the 242nd Street I.R.T. subway station, on Broadway; on the right is the Horace Mann High School, on West 246th Street.

About 1917
title: Bronx: Van Cortlandt Park.

text:
Corner of kitchen, Van Cortlandt Museum, Van Cortlandt Park, Broadway and 242nd St., Bronx.
n.d. [1920's?]

Van Cortlandt Park (Bronx): Northwestward across the lower end of the park and Van Cortland Lake. View 2 is directly west toward the 242nd Street station of the I.R.T. subway on Broadway.

May 8, 1928
Views 1, 2

P. L. Sperr
title: Bronx: Van Cortlandt Park.
